title: Ancestral Bungalow for Sale in Ratnapura
details: In the City of Gems in Sri Lanka, Ratnapura, there is a Colonial style Bungalow Built-in 1928. Restored. The old fashion Ancestral Residence of a long-standing family in Ratnapura. Consists Large Verandah, 5 Bedrooms, 2 Toilets, Large sitting room, spacious Dining area, valuable doors and windows, wood carvings, cement decorative work etc…
